description: A lesser known cocktail and a variant on the Negroni. For this one add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and stir down with ice. Garnish with a twist of orange peel.
recipe: 20ml of Campari ,,20ml of Vermouth ,,20ml Rye Whiskey

description: Simple 1800s cocktail, add ingredients to a glass and stir. Serve neat and garnish with an orangepeel or maraschino cherry
recipe: 50ml of Rye Whiskey ,,10ml of Sweet Red Vermouth,,2-3 dashes of bitters

description: A classic cocktail considered the height of class. For this one just add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and stir down with ice or shake if you prefer more dilute. Garnish with a twist of lemon rind or some olives.
recipe: 60ml of Vodka ,,10-15ml of Vermouth (~5ml for dry, 10ml but pour it out again for extra dry) ,,Optional: 10-20ml olive brine for a dirty martini

description: A classic cocktail as simple as they come. For this one just add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and stir down with ice. Garnish with a twist of orange peel
recipe: 60ml of Bourbon ,,3-4 dashes of bitters ,,10-15ml of sugarsyrup

description: A taste of mexico, the go to cocktail for a great night. Add all the ingredients and shake over ice. Serve in a glass with a salt rim.
recipe: 45ml of Tequila ,,15ml of Cointreau ,,30ml Lime juice ,,Optional: 10-15ml Sugar syrup if you like things sweeter

description: A drink with tropical vibes best shaken. Serve neat and garnish with a lime.
recipe: 60ml of White Rum ,,30ml lime juice ,,15ml sugar syrup

description: The big coctail everyone has knows. Add all, shake, and top with cola. Garnish with a lemon wedge or lime wheel
recipe: 15ml of Vodka ,,15ml of Gin ,,15ml of Tequila ,,15ml of White Rum,, 15ml of Triple Sec ,,15ml sugar syrup ,,15ml Lemon juice ,,15ml Lime Juice,, Cola ,, Optional: 30ml of either lime or lemon juice is fine if you only have 1

description: The taste of Brazi. Build this one in the glass. Muddle (crush) the limes in the bottom of the glass. Add the sugar, fill with crushed ice and pour the Cachaça over the top and stir. Garnish with a lime wheel
recipe: 60ml of Cachaça ,,3-4 Lime wedges ,,15ml sugar syrup

description: A pick-me-up on a long night or a coffee for a hot day. Add the ingredients to a shaker and shake aggressively (To get that nice foam). Garnish with a few coffee beans.
recipe: 30ml of Vodka ,,30ml of Coffee liqueur ,,15ml sugar syrup ,, 30ml of espresso (1 shot) ,, Optional: 15ml of Chocolate Liqueur

description: A refreshing drink for a hot day. Place the lime and mint at the bottom of the glass and muddle (crush together). Add the rum and sugar, some ice, and top with soda. Garnish with a lime wheel and a mint sprig. Pro Tip: If you 'crack' the mint first by placing it in your palm and smaking with the back of your hand, you release the flavour more.
recipe: 60ml of White Rum ,,Half a lime cut to wedges,, 5-10 large mint leaves ,,15ml sugar syrup ,,Soda water
